name: Find The Gap (broquaint)
description:
Find The Gap

You wish to become one with the void, but you're running out of time—you need to find the gap on each floor and make it to the void at the end of each level. The deeper you go the more often floors will become "locked"—you will need to collect all the keys on that floor to unlock the gaps. The goal of the game is to get to the deepest level.

This is the first game I've completed and released, I hope you enjoy it!

Controls
  • ⬅️ ➡️ — Movement
  • ❎ / X — Jump
  • 🅾️ / Z — Start/retry
Game Jam

This is an entry for the inaugural Eggplant Community Game Jam where the theme is "Going Into The Void".
